data.name: Yukyo Station
data.detailed_description:
A story-driven, 2D, action packed, rogue-like platformer set in a fictional nation's metro system infested with the supernatural!

  • Shoot and slash ink monsters from the back of a train to the front, clearing one train car at a time.
  • Along the way, meet challenging AIs for a diverse and wild gameplay experience.
  • Equip and upgrade a wide variety of guns, creating a unique run each time.
  • Go toe-to-toe in memorable mini-boss and final boss battles.
  • Explore Yukyo City, visiting 12 train stations across four islands.
  • Free overworked citizens from the spirit of the 15th century legendary warlord Tomamo.

Nearly endless hours of action-packed, arcade-style gameplay in a compelling fantasy story inspired by current events. All brought to life by a living, breathing pixel art style!

data.short_description: A story-driven, 2D, action packed, rogue-like platformer set in a fictional nation's metro system infested with the supernatural.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bit Microsoft® Windows® 7 SP1, 8.1, 10 (version 1607 or better)
  • Processor: 64bit 1.5 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 (DirectX® 10) compliant graphics card and driver
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64bit Microsoft® Windows® 10 (version 1607 or better)
  • Processor: 64bit Multi-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 (DirectX® 10) compliant graphics card and driver
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game controller recommended
